GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.60
GSD.description:
arm64: set UXN on swapper page tables

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.60 by commit 775871d4be0d75e219cca937af843a4a1b60489a, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 18107f8a2df6bf1c6cac8d0713f757f866d5af51. For more details please see the references link.
